name: NuclearDanger
description:
Congratulations comrade !

You have been randomly selected to improve our proud nation's nuclear arsenal. I'm sure you'll manage. Don't disappoint us.

Featuring yeetable physics :

Death :

And Russian voicelines spoken by a French guy after translating in English !

Controls : 

Mouse & Keyboard :

  • WASD/Arrow keys : Movement
  • Mouse : Look around
  • Mouse scroll wheel : Push/Pull
  • Left click : Use/Grab
  • Right click : Throw
  • R (while holding object) : Rotate object
  • Shift : Walk/Push/Pull slowly

360/One Controller :

  • Left stick : Movement
  • Right stick : Look around
  • X : Pull
  • Y : Push
  • Right trigger : Grab
  • Left trigger : Throw
  • A (While holding object) : Rotate object
  • B : Walk/Push/Pull slowly
